website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly and high-performance hand dryer.
pros: Maximum draw of 4.5 A, which means multiple units can be installed on one circuit
cons: Not intended for use in cold environments

customer_reviews.title: it worked for a few times after installing it today ...
customer_reviews.text: it worked for a few times after installing it today..blows hard but when you place your hands under the blower nothing happens . received the product on may 18th but installed it today july the 27th as i was travelling abroad. nope the return period ended and do not know if i have any warranty. please let me know if i can return it and get another one ..it should have some kind of warranty
customer_reviews.author: fivos kazilas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great price, we are saving so much in paper towels!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality hair dryer. I prefer the Eco version because it is much cheaper than the version with the built-in heater. This is a direct fit replacement for the hand dryer at most in my facilities and I like the fact that I can swap out the internals without having to change the back plate
customer_reviews.author: Emil R. Illian

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to buy at this price .
customer_reviews.text: I like this hand dryer. I use it in my business bathroom. The only complaint is no heat come out.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Chen

customer_reviews.title: The security wrench was missing
customer_reviews.text: The security wrench was missing from my order. It is not available anywhere that I have checked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to hire a liscenced electrician to install
customer_reviews.text: Product was specified for a project but I think they could have went with an upgraded version of the same brand
customer_reviews.author: Francis Mazzella

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement
customer_reviews.text: One of the units we bought doesn’t work. How can I contact the seller?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would recommend to any business as long as noise isn't an ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not excited about purchasing these for work, I'm not a fan of blow dryers. Have been really surprised though. The blower is powerful and a quick shake, followed by maybe 10 seconds under this blower and your hands are dry. This is a quality product, would recommend to any business as long as noise isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Strasser

customer_reviews.title: not good for cold enviorments
customer_reviews.text: not good for cold environments. Air that will blow out will be freezing and will dry your hands minimally.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer but heat element defective
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 and the heat element in the first was defective so was replaced by Amazon. Now 2 years later the heat element on the 2nd is gone. Trying to get in touch with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

product_meta.title: Excel Dryer XLERATOReco XL-BW-ECO Hand Dryer, No Heat, White Thermoset Resin (BMC) Cover, Automatic Sensor, Surface Mounted, LEED Credits, GreenSpec Listed, Commercial Hand Dryer, 500 Watts
product_meta.description: Enhanced control features speed and sound control and externally visible LED light to assist with troubleshooting. Maximum draw of 4.5 amps allows for multiple units can be installed on one circuit, which significantly reduces the time and costs of installation. Represent a 95 percent cost savings when compared to paper towels and eliminates their labor, maintenance and waste, while creating a more hygienic restroom environment. Housing is made with heavy-duty, one-piece die cast zinc alloy that is rust-proof and unbreakable. Rib reinforced for added strength and durability. White Thermoset (BMC) cover. Includes hardware for surface mounting. 5/8 HP motor offers 20,000 RPM with an air velocity of 16,000 LFM (Linear Feet per Minute). 110/120V, 4.3-4.5 Amp and . Infrared optical sensor activated. Measures 11-3/4W x 6-11/16D x 12-11/16H. UL, CUL, CSA, OSHA approved.
feature_bullets: XLERATOReco new 'No Heat' technology dries hands in 15 seconds using only 500 watts, making it the most environmentally-friendly way to dry hands on the planet.
Allows for the installation of up to 3 XLERATOReco units on one 20 Amp circuit significantly reducing installation costs and time.
XLERATOReco continues Excel Dryer’s commitment to providing the most energy-efficient hand dryers with the same proven performance, reliability and durability expected from XLERATOR.
XLERATOReco sets another new industry standard in green innovation and sustainability, and allows facilities to use even less energy than ever before.
